actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The deathsworn makes two melee attacks or four ranged attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Volley (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The deathsworn shoots a rain of fiery arrows in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Archer's Step
special_abilities.desc: The deathsworn can use Disengage as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Death Bolt (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action after firing an arrow, the deathsworn can imbue the arrow with magical power, causing it to trail green fire. The arrow deals an extra 7 (2d6) fire damage.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: The deathsworn has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the deathsworn to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The deathsworn has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The deathsworn's weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Stealthy Traveler
special_abilities.desc: The deathsworn can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Surprise Attack
special_abilities.desc: If the deathsworn surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.
